• plans for applying for Child Support Grant, if qualifies. If needed, refer woman to get an ID document as soon
as
 possible.
Five danger signs of pregnancy 
• severe headache
• abdominal pain (not discomfort)
• drainage of liquor from the vagina
• vaginal bleeding irrespective of amount
• reduced fetal movements
A woman that experiences any of these danger signs should report immediately to her clinic or hospital with her
